Books.Comments: Most famous for his Ringworld series, here's a great novel encompassing great ideas of being a corpsicle, starship rammer and 3 million years of future evolution. Lookout for his new book <a href=\"http:\/\/www.amazon.co.uk/exec/obidos/asin/1841491705/haeften-21/\" target=\"_top\" title=\"Click to see details and price on Amazon\">Ringworld's Child<\/a> due out in June 2004.
